concept.title: 5212.9001 Procedures.

conbody.p: (a) Submit determinations for contracts awarded under a Commercial Solutions Opening (CSO) in excess of $100 million, pursuant to DPC Class Deviation 2022-O0007, for ASN(RDA) approval via DASN(P) by email to usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil, with the subject “[Activity Name] NMCARS 5212. 9001(a) – Commercial Solutions Opening Determination”. The specific content and format of the determination shall conform to Annex 11, Defense Commercial Solutions Opening Determination & Finding Template.

(b) For awards in excess of $100M, the contracting officer shall submit the required congressional defense committees’ notification set forth in DPC Class Deviation 2022-O0007 on the day of contract award via email to usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil, with the subject “[Activity Name] NMCARS 5212. 9001(b) – Commercial Solutions Opening Congressional Notification”. This notification does not take the place of the announcement of contract awards in accordance with DFARS 205.303 and NMCARS 5205.303
